articles.author: Lauran Neergaard
articles.title: US opens second COVID boosters to 50 and up, others at risk - The Associated Press
articles.description: Americans 50 and older can get a second COVID-19 booster if it’s been at least four months since their last vaccination, a chance at extra protection for the most vulnerable in case the coronavirus rebounds.

articles.title: Biden's Sanctions-Architect In India Ahead Of Russian Minister's Visit - NDTV
articles.description: Top Indian-American US adviser and a key architect of Washington's punitive economic sanctions against Moscow, Daleep Singh, will arrive in India for a 2-day visit today to discuss the "consequences" of Russia's "unjustified war" against Ukraine.
articles.content:
US Deputy National Security Adviser Daleep Singh will be in New Delhi on March 30 and 31

articles.title: US skeptical of Russian claims it's scaling back the war in Ukraine - CNN
